## MapView.addEventListener() method

Adds an event listener. There are various events that are sent before or after a new frame is rendered.

 \[\[MapViewEventNames\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEventListener(type: MapViewEventNames, listener: (event: RenderEvent) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [MapViewEventNames](./harp-mapview.mapvieweventnames.md) | One of the \[\[MapViewEventNames\]\] strings. |
|  listener | (event: [RenderEvent](./harp-mapview.renderevent.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | The callback invoked when the <code>MapView</code> needs to render a new frame. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```TypeScript
let frameCount = 0;
mapView.addEventListener(MapViewEventNames.Render, () => {
    ++frameCount;
});

```
